amendment.description: Amendment sought to add a section which includes findings for health costs and benefits of EPA's mercury and air toxics cleanup standards for large cement plants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to add a section which includes findings for health costs and benefits for the rules specified in section 3(b).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 254 (Roll no. 749).
